meanings.definition: Resembling the sky in appearance or color.
meanings.sent1: The painting had a skylike background that made it feel peaceful.
meanings.sent2: The skylike scarf matched perfectly with her blue dress.
meanings.sent3: The skylike cupcakes were a hit at the party, everyone loved them!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were a deep, skylike blue, captivating everyone who looked into them.
meanings.sent5: The skylike sunset painted the horizon in shades of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to the sky.
meanings.sent1: The kite soared high in the skylike breeze.
meanings.sent2: His voice had a skylike quality, calming everyone who listened.
meanings.sent3: The skylike music filled the room, creating a serene atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was light and skylike, bringing joy to all around her.
meanings.sent5: The skylike clouds drifted lazily across the horizon, resembling cotton candy.
